verses.verse: וְזֹ֣את <S%H2063><s%> likewise הַבְּרָכָ֗ה <S%H1293><s%> And this [is] the blessing אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which בֵּרַ֥ךְ <S%H1288><s%> blessed מֹשֶׁ֛ה <S%H4872><s%> wherewith Moses אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> the man הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> of God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> before מוֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H4194><s%> his death

וַיֹּאמַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> And he said יְהוָ֞ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD מִסִּינַ֥י <S%H5514><s%> from Sinai בָּא֙ <S%H935><s%> came וְזָרַ֤ח <S%H2224><s%> and rose up מִשֵּׂעִיר֙ <S%H8165><s%> from Seir לָ֔מוֹ הוֹפִ֙יעַ֙ <S%H3313><s%> unto them he shined forth מֵהַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> from mount פָּארָ֔ן <S%H6290><s%> Paran וְאָתָ֖ה <S%H857><s%> and he came מֵרִבְבֹ֣ת <S%H7233><s%> with ten thousands קֹ֑דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> of saints מִֽימִינ֕וֹ <S%H3225><s%> from his right hand [אֵשְׁדָּת כ] (אֵ֥שׁ ק) (דָּ֖ת <S%H799><s%> fiery law ק) לָֽמוֹ׃

אַ֚ף <S%H637><s%> Yea חֹבֵ֣ב <S%H2245><s%> he loved עַמִּ֔ים <S%H5971><s%> the people כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All קְדֹשָׁ֖יו <S%H6918><s%> all his saints בְּיָדֶ֑ךָ <S%H3027><s%> [are] in thy hand וְהֵם֙ <S%H1992><s%> and they תֻּכּ֣וּ <S%H8497><s%> and they sat down לְרַגְלֶ֔ךָ <S%H7272><s%> at thy feet יִשָּׂ֖א <S%H5375><s%> [every one] shall receive מִדַּבְּרֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H1703><s%> of thy words

תּוֹרָ֥ה <S%H8451><s%> us a law צִוָּה־ <S%H6680><s%> commanded לָ֖נוּ מֹשֶׁ֑ה <S%H4872><s%> Moses מוֹרָשָׁ֖ה <S%H4181><s%> [even] the inheritance קְהִלַּ֥ת <S%H6952><s%> of the congregation יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob

וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> become בִישֻׁר֖וּן <S%H3484><s%> in Jeshurun מֶ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And he was king בְּהִתְאַסֵּף֙ <S%H622><s%> were gathered רָ֣אשֵׁי <S%H7218><s%> when the heads עָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people יַ֖חַד <S%H3162><s%> together שִׁבְטֵ֥י <S%H7626><s%> [and] the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

יְחִ֥י <S%H2421><s%> live רְאוּבֵ֖ן <S%H7205><s%> Let Reuben וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> Nor יָמֹ֑ת <S%H4191><s%> and not die וִיהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> become מְתָ֖יו <S%H4962><s%> and let [not] his men מִסְפָּֽר׃ <S%H4557><s%> be few ס

וְזֹ֣את <S%H2063><s%> regarding לִֽיהוּדָה֮ <S%H3063><s%> And this [is the blessing] of Judah וַיֹּאמַר֒ <S%H559><s%> and he said שְׁמַ֤ע <S%H8085><s%> Hear יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> LORD ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the voice יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to עַמּ֖וֹ <S%H5971><s%> him unto his people תְּבִיאֶ֑נּוּ <S%H935><s%> and bring יָדָיו֙ <S%H3027><s%> let his hands רָ֣ב <S%H7227><s%> be sufficient ל֔וֹ וְעֵ֥זֶר <S%H5828><s%> for him and be thou an help מִצָּרָ֖יו <S%H6862><s%> [to him] from his enemies תִּהְיֶֽה׃ <S%H1961><s%> become ס

וּלְלֵוִ֣י <S%H3878><s%> And of Levi אָמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> he said תֻּמֶּ֥יךָ <S%H8550><s%> [Let] thy Thummim וְאוּרֶ֖יךָ <S%H224><s%> and thy Urim לְאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> one חֲסִידֶ֑ךָ <S%H2623><s%> [be] with thy holy אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> Whom נִסִּיתוֹ֙ <S%H5254><s%> whom thou didst prove בְּמַסָּ֔ה <S%H4532><s%> at Massah תְּרִיבֵ֖הוּ <S%H7378><s%> [and with] whom thou didst strive עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> at מֵ֥י <S%H4325><s%> at the waters מְרִיבָֽה׃ <S%H4809><s%> of Meribah

הָאֹמֵ֞ר <S%H559><s%> Who said לְאָבִ֤יו <S%H1><s%> unto his father וּלְאִמּוֹ֙ <S%H517><s%> and to his mother לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Nor רְאִיתִ֔יו <S%H7200><s%> I have not seen וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶחָיו֙ <S%H251><s%> his brethren לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Nor הִכִּ֔יר <S%H5234><s%> him neither did he acknowledge וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> [בָּנֹו כ] (בָּנָ֖יו <S%H1121><s%> afflicted ק) לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Nor יָדָ֑ע <S%H3045><s%> nor knew כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for שָֽׁמְרוּ֙ <S%H8104><s%> for they have observed אִמְרָתֶ֔ךָ <S%H565><s%> thy word וּבְרִֽיתְךָ֖ <S%H1285><s%> thy covenant יִנְצֹֽרוּ׃ <S%H5341><s%> and kept

יוֹר֤וּ <S%H3384><s%> They shall teach מִשְׁפָּטֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H4941><s%> thy judgments לְיַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> Jacob וְתוֹרָתְךָ֖ <S%H8451><s%> thy law לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> and Israel יָשִׂ֤ימוּ <S%H7760><s%> they shall put קְטוֹרָה֙ <S%H6988><s%> incense בְּאַפֶּ֔ךָ <S%H639><s%> before וְכָלִ֖יל <S%H3632><s%> thee and whole burnt sacrifice עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> on מִזְבְּחֶֽךָ׃ <S%H4196><s%> upon thine altar

בָּרֵ֤ךְ <S%H1288><s%> Bless יְהוָה֙ <S%H3069><s%> God חֵיל֔וֹ <S%H2428><s%> his substance וּפֹ֥עַל <S%H6467><s%> the work יָדָ֖יו <S%H3027><s%> of his hands תִּרְצֶ֑ה <S%H7521><s%> and accept מְחַ֨ץ <S%H4272><s%> smite מָתְנַ֧יִם <S%H4975><s%> through the loins קָמָ֛יו <S%H6965><s%> of them that rise וּמְשַׂנְאָ֖יו <S%H8130><s%> against him and of them that hate מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> not יְקוּמֽוּן׃ <S%H6965><s%> again ס

לְבִנְיָמִ֣ן <S%H1144><s%> [And] of Benjamin אָמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> he said יְדִ֣יד <S%H3039><s%> The beloved יְהֹוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD יִשְׁכֹּ֥ן <S%H7931><s%> shall dwell לָבֶ֖טַח <S%H983><s%> in safety עָלָ֑יו <S%H5921><s%> and חֹפֵ֤ף <S%H2653><s%> by him [and the LORD] shall cover עָלָיו֙ <S%H5921><s%> and כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> him all the day וּבֵ֥ין <S%H996><s%> between כְּתֵיפָ֖יו <S%H3802><s%> between his shoulders שָׁכֵֽן׃ <S%H7931><s%> long and he shall dwell ס

וּלְיוֹסֵ֣ף <S%H3130><s%> And of Joseph אָמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> he said מְבֹרֶ֥כֶת <S%H1288><s%> Blessed יְהֹוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אַרְצ֑וֹ <S%H776><s%> [be] his land מִמֶּ֤גֶד <S%H4022><s%> for the precious things שָׁמַ֙יִם֙ <S%H8064><s%> of heaven מִטָּ֔ל <S%H2919><s%> for the dew וּמִתְּה֖וֹם <S%H8415><s%> and for the deep רֹבֶ֥צֶת <S%H7257><s%> that coucheth beneath תָּֽחַת׃ <S%H8478><s%> beneath

וּמִמֶּ֖גֶד <S%H4022><s%> And for the precious תְּבוּאֹ֣ת <S%H8393><s%> fruits שָׁ֑מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> [brought forth] by the sun וּמִמֶּ֖גֶד <S%H4022><s%> and for the precious things גֶּ֥רֶשׁ <S%H1645><s%> put forth יְרָחִֽים׃ <S%H3391><s%> by the moon

וּמֵרֹ֖אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> And for the chief things הַרְרֵי־ <S%H2042><s%> mountains קֶ֑דֶם <S%H6924><s%> of the ancient וּמִמֶּ֖גֶד <S%H4022><s%> and for the precious things גִּבְע֥וֹת <S%H1389><s%> hills עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> of the lasting

וּמִמֶּ֗גֶד <S%H4022><s%> And for the precious things אֶ֚רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth וּמְלֹאָ֔הּ <S%H4393><s%> and fulness וּרְצ֥וֹן <S%H7522><s%> thereof and [for] the good will שֹׁכְנִ֖י <S%H7931><s%> of him that dwelt סְנֶ֑ה <S%H5572><s%> in the bush תָּב֙וֹאתָה֙ <S%H935><s%> let [the blessing] come לְרֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> upon the head יוֹסֵ֔ף <S%H3130><s%> of Joseph וּלְקָדְקֹ֖ד <S%H6936><s%> and upon the top of the head נְזִ֥יר <S%H5139><s%> of him [that was] separated אֶחָֽיו׃ <S%H251><s%> from his brethren

בְּכ֨וֹר <S%H1060><s%> [is like] the firstling שׁוֹר֜וֹ <S%H7794><s%> of his bullock הָדָ֣ר <S%H1926><s%> His glory ל֗וֹ וְקַרְנֵ֤י <S%H7161><s%> and his horns רְאֵם֙ <S%H7214><s%> of unicorns קַרְנָ֔יו <S%H7161><s%> [are like] the horns בָּהֶ֗ם עַמִּ֛ים <S%H5971><s%> the people יְנַגַּ֥ח <S%H5055><s%> with them he shall push יַחְדָּ֖ו <S%H3162><s%> together אַפְסֵי־ <S%H657><s%> to the ends אָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth וְהֵם֙ <S%H1992><s%> and those רִבְב֣וֹת <S%H7233><s%> and they [are] the ten thousands אֶפְרַ֔יִם <S%H669><s%> of Ephraim וְהֵ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> and those אַלְפֵ֥י <S%H505><s%> and they [are] the thousands מְנַשֶּֽׁה׃ <S%H4519><s%> of Manasseh ס

וְלִזְבוּלֻ֣ן <S%H2074><s%> And of Zebulun אָמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> he said שְׂמַ֥ח <S%H8055><s%> Rejoice זְבוּלֻ֖ן <S%H2074><s%> Zebulun בְּצֵאתֶ֑ךָ <S%H3318><s%> in thy going out וְיִשָּׂשכָ֖ר <S%H3485><s%> and Issachar בְּאֹהָלֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H168><s%> in thy tents

עַמִּים֙ <S%H5971><s%> the people הַר־ <S%H2022><s%> unto the mountain יִקְרָ֔אוּ <S%H7121><s%> They shall call שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> There יִזְבְּח֣וּ <S%H2076><s%> there they shall offer זִבְחֵי־ <S%H2077><s%> sacrifices צֶ֑דֶק <S%H6664><s%> of righteousness כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> out שֶׁ֤פַע <S%H8228><s%> [of] the abundance יַמִּים֙ <S%H3220><s%> of the seas יִינָ֔קוּ <S%H3243><s%> for they shall suck וּשְׂפוּנֵ֖י <S%H8226><s%> and [of] treasures טְמ֥וּנֵי <S%H2934><s%> hid חֽוֹל׃ <S%H2344><s%> in the sand ס

וּלְגָ֣ד <S%H1410><s%> And of Gad אָמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> he said בָּר֖וּךְ <S%H1288><s%> Blessed מַרְחִ֣יב <S%H7337><s%> [be] he that enlargeth גָּ֑ד <S%H1410><s%> Gad כְּלָבִ֣יא <S%H3833><s%> as a lion שָׁכֵ֔ן <S%H7931><s%> he dwelleth וְטָרַ֥ף <S%H2963><s%> and teareth זְר֖וֹעַ <S%H2220><s%> the arm אַף־ <S%H637><s%> with קָדְקֹֽד׃ <S%H6936><s%> the crown of the head

וַיַּ֤רְא <S%H7200><s%> And he provided רֵאשִׁית֙ <S%H7225><s%> the first part ל֔וֹ כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> For שָׁ֛ם <S%H8033><s%> there חֶלְקַ֥ת <S%H2513><s%> for himself because there [in] a portion מְחֹקֵ֖ק <S%H2710><s%> of the lawgiver סָפ֑וּן <S%H5603><s%> [was he] seated וַיֵּתֵא֙ <S%H857><s%> and he came רָ֣אשֵׁי <S%H7218><s%> with the heads עָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people צִדְקַ֤ת <S%H6666><s%> the justice יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD עָשָׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> he executed וּמִשְׁפָּטָ֖יו <S%H4941><s%> and his judgments עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> with Israel ס

וּלְדָ֣ן <S%H1835><s%> And of Dan אָמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> he said דָּ֖ן <S%H1835><s%> Dan גּ֣וּר <S%H1482><s%> whelp אַרְיֵ֑ה <S%H738><s%> [is] a lion's יְזַנֵּ֖ק <S%H2187><s%> he shall leap מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַבָּשָֽׁן׃ <S%H1316><s%> from Bashan

וּלְנַפְתָּלִ֣י <S%H5321><s%> And of Naphtali אָמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> he said נַפְתָּלִי֙ <S%H5321><s%> O Naphtali שְׂבַ֣ע <S%H7649><s%> satisfied רָצ֔וֹן <S%H7522><s%> with favour וּמָלֵ֖א <S%H4392><s%> and full בִּרְכַּ֣ת <S%H1293><s%> with the blessing יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD יָ֥ם <S%H3220><s%> thou the west וְדָר֖וֹם <S%H1864><s%> and the south יְרָֽשָׁה׃ <S%H3423><s%> possess ס

וּלְאָשֵׁ֣ר <S%H836><s%> And of Asher אָמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> he said בָּר֥וּךְ <S%H1288><s%> [be] blessed מִבָּנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> with children אָשֵׁ֑ר <S%H836><s%> [Let] Asher יְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> become רְצוּי֙ <S%H7521><s%> let him be acceptable אֶחָ֔יו <S%H251><s%> to his brethren וְטֹבֵ֥ל <S%H2881><s%> and let him dip בַּשֶּׁ֖מֶן <S%H8081><s%> in oil רַגְלֽוֹ׃ <S%H7272><s%> his foot

בַּרְזֶ֥ל <S%H1270><s%> [shall be] iron וּנְחֹ֖שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> and brass מִנְעָלֶ֑יךָ <S%H4515><s%> Thy shoes וּכְיָמֶ֖יךָ <S%H3117><s%> and as thy days דָּבְאֶֽךָ׃ <S%H1679><s%> [so shall] thy strength

אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> There כָּאֵ֖ל <S%H410><s%> [There is] none like unto the God יְשֻׁר֑וּן <S%H3484><s%> of Jeshurun רֹכֵ֤ב <S%H7392><s%> [who] rideth שָׁמַ֙יִם֙ <S%H8064><s%> upon the heaven בְעֶזְרֶ֔ךָ <S%H5828><s%> in thy help וּבְגַאֲוָת֖וֹ <S%H1346><s%> and in his excellency שְׁחָקִֽים׃ <S%H7834><s%> on the sky

מְעֹנָה֙ <S%H4585><s%> [is thy] refuge אֱלֹ֣הֵי <S%H430><s%> God קֶ֔דֶם <S%H6924><s%> The eternal וּמִתַּ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> and underneath זְרֹעֹ֣ת <S%H2220><s%> arms עוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> and underneath [are] the everlasting וַיְגָ֧רֶשׁ <S%H1644><s%> and he shall thrust out מִפָּנֶ֛יךָ <S%H6440><s%> from before אוֹיֵ֖ב <S%H341><s%> the enemy וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> thee and shall say הַשְׁמֵֽד׃ <S%H8045><s%> Destroy

וַיִּשְׁכֹּן֩ <S%H7931><s%> then shall dwell יִשְׂרָאֵ֨ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel בֶּ֤טַח <S%H983><s%> in safety בָּדָד֙ <S%H910><s%> alone עֵ֣ין <S%H5869><s%> the fountain יַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> in אֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> [shall be] upon a land דָּגָ֣ן <S%H1715><s%> of corn וְתִיר֑וֹשׁ <S%H8492><s%> and wine אַף־ <S%H637><s%> also שָׁמָ֖יו <S%H8064><s%> also his heavens יַ֥עַרְפוּ <S%H6201><s%> shall drop down טָֽל׃ <S%H2919><s%> dew

אַשְׁרֶ֨יךָ <S%H835><s%> Happy יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <S%H3478><s%> [art] thou O Israel מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> Who כָמ֗וֹךָ <S%H3644><s%> is like עַ֚ם <S%H5971><s%> who [is] like unto thee O people נוֹשַׁ֣ע <S%H3467><s%> saved בַּֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> by the LORD מָגֵ֣ן <S%H4043><s%> the shield עֶזְרֶ֔ךָ <S%H5828><s%> of thy help וַאֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> and חֶ֖רֶב <S%H2719><s%> and who [is] the sword גַּאֲוָתֶ֑ךָ <S%H1346><s%> of thy excellency וְיִכָּֽחֲשׁ֤וּ <S%H3584><s%> shall be found liars אֹיְבֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H341><s%> and thine enemies לָ֔ךְ וְאַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> you עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon בָּמוֹתֵ֥ימוֹ <S%H1116><s%> upon their high places תִדְרֹֽךְ׃ <S%H1869><s%> unto thee and thou shalt tread ס
